::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus goes to the comm panel on the wall and opens a channel to the bases command center.

Rodimus: This is Rodimus. I need someone to run a large sensor sweep over the planet. I need to know if we pick up an altered Decepticon signature anywhere. Is there anything else unusual going on?

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  OOC:  I don't know what happened but my last post seems to be missing
 :-(  Sorry if i double-post.
 
 BIC:
 
 Salveo's CR chamber beeps and the door swings open.
 
 "Refreshing!" he said with a smile and he glances over at Lord Perseus' chamber.
 
 The chamber panel indicated that there were 15 cycles remaining.
 
 He walked out the door and toward the command center.
 
 Meanwhile....
 
 "The is the Pasificus Maximal base to all maximals and allies in
 Relay.  Please respond.  What is the situation?" said Guardia,
 becoming frustrated that when was getting nothing but static over the
 radio.
 
 The scanner indicated that there was a large amount of arial activity
 over the city, but the network link had cut out a while ago and she
 was unable to get any more detailed information.
 
 On 8/2/07, xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
